DocLocalization.Name: Einfügepunkt mit zwei Achsen - zweidimensionaler Raum (2D)

DocAttribute.Name: RefDirection
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction used to determine the direction of the local X axis. If a value is omited that it defaults to [1.0, 0.0.].

DocAttribute.Name: P
DocAttribute.Documentation: _P[1]_: The normalized direction of the placement X Axis. This is [1.0,0.0] if _RefDirection_ is omitted. _P[2]_: The normalized direction of the placement Y Axis. This is a derived attribute and is orthogonal to P[1]. If _RefDirection_ is omitted, it defaults to [0.0,1.0]
